title: Onion bhajis
ingredients: ['75g (3 oz) chickpea flour (besan)', '175ml (6 fl oz) water', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '1 tablespoon coriander seeds', '1 onion, halved and thinly sliced', '1/2 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '1 pinch ground turmeric', '2 chillies, seeded and minced', '225ml (8 fl oz) vegetable oil for frying']
